casebody.data:
Mae C. Riley v. State Employees Retirement Commission Richard J. Lynch, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (defendant). David A. Piskorski, for the appellant (plaintiff). David A. Piskorski, in support of the motion. Argued December 6 decided December 6, 1977 Submitted November 23

decided December 6, 1977

The defendant’s motion to dismiss the appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Hartford County is denied by the court.

The plaintiff’s motion for an order to the trial court requesting a limited finding in the appeal from the Court of Common Pleas in Hartford County is denied by the court.
